mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('lock-', ni.instance_id) AS orderId, ni.price, ni.updated_at AS createdAt, '待支付' AS status, '待支付' AS type, n.name, n.image_url AS imageUrl, #{walletAddress} AS walletAddress FROM nft_instances ni JOIN nfts n ON ni.nft_id = n.id WHERE ni.locked_by = #{walletAddress} AND ni.locked_at IS NOT NULL AND (ni.lock_expiry IS NULL OR ni.lock_expiry > NOW())

SELECT CONCAT('pr-', pr.id) AS orderId, pr.price, pr.created_at AS createdAt, '求购中' AS status, '求购中' AS type, n.name, n.image_url AS imageUrl, #{walletAddress} AS walletAddress FROM purchase_requests pr JOIN nfts n ON pr.nft_id = n.id WHERE pr.buyer_address = #{walletAddress} AND pr.status = 'requesting'

SELECT CONCAT('t-', t.id) AS orderId, t.price, t.transaction_date AS createdAt, '已完成' AS status, CASE WHEN t.type = 'purchase' THEN '购买' WHEN t.type = 'purchase_request' THEN '求购成交' ELSE t.type END AS type, n.name, n.image_url AS imageUrl, #{walletAddress} AS walletAddress FROM transactions t JOIN nfts n ON t.nft_id = n.id WHERE (t.from_address = #{walletAddress} OR t.to_address = #{walletAddress}) AND t.type IN ('purchase', 'purchase_request')
